certifications.description: Completed an intensive Java training covering foundational concepts, Object-Oriented Programming principles, and Java app development, including 2 practical projects. Achieved an outstanding 93% score in the final assessment, earning recognition as a top performer in the training.
certifications.title: Core Java online
Meta Front-end developer and HTML, CSS, JavaScript for Web Developers

projects.name: Video Conferencing App
projects.description: Managed video conferencing platform, provided technical support and integrated the messaging functionality. Implemented React.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js for the backend, guaranteeing a seamless and responsive user experience, and coordinated virtual events, increasing efficiency.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website for Grocery Products
projects.description: Developed using React.js for frontend, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for backend, with MockAPI for testing. Crafted a fully functional e-commerce simulation, dedicating 3 months to development, integrating features such as add to cart, checkout process, and PayPal integration for payment options, enriching the shopping experience.

projects.name: Movie and Series Application
projects.description: Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (React.js) to enhance page load times and efficient search functionality. Seamlessly integrated frontend design, backend development, and API integration, improving the overall movie watching experience and user engagement.

projects.name: Employee Management System
projects.description: Developed a Java-based Employee Management System with MySQL integration, enabling efficient CRUD operations for employee records. featured functionalities for adding, viewing, updating, and deleting employee records. Leveraged JDBC for smooth database connectivity, ensuring reliable and responsive interactions between the application and the database.

experiences.description: Developed a MERN stack-based food delivery app with features for browsing, ordering, and managing food items, incorporated Material-UI for a polished and responsive user interface. Implemented essential functionalities like search, cart management, and admin controls, ensuring an intuitive experience for both users and administrators.
